meanings.definition: The small letters of the alphabet, as opposed to the capital letters.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using lowercases when typing on the computer.
meanings.sent2: Remember to use lowercases for the body of the text.
meanings.sent3: The lowercases decided to rebel against the capital letters.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of fonts, the lowercases emerged victorious.
meanings.sent5: The lowercases huddled together, forming words of unity.

meanings.definition: To write or print in lowercase letters.
meanings.sent1: She always lowercases her notes for better readability.
meanings.sent2: Please lowercases the title of the document.
meanings.sent3: The cat lowercases its name on the wall with its tail.
meanings.sent4: His emotions lowercases across the page, raw and unfiltered.
meanings.sent5: The artist lowercases the poem, adding a touch of intimacy.
